properties.Name: Old Baldy Lighthouse
properties.description:
Find out more about Old Baldy Lighthouse here! (http://ncpedia.org/old-baldy-lighthouse)

Did you know?
First lit in 1817, Old Baldy is the oldest standing lighthouse in North Carolina.

properties.Name: Currituck Beach Lighthouse
properties.description:
Image courtesy of the State Archives of North Carolina (http://www.flickr.com/photos/north-carolina-state-archives/5387071431/)

Find out more about the Currituck Beach Lighthouse here! (http://ncpedia.org/currituck-beach-lighthouse)

Did you know?
Lit December 1, 1875, Currituck Beach Lighthouse was the last major brick lighthouse built on the Outer Banks.

properties.Name: Oak Island Lighthouse
properties.description:
Image courtesy of the State Archives of North Carolina (http://www.flickr.com/photos/north-carolina-state-archives/5387674258/)

Find out more about Oak Island Lighthouse here! (http://ncpedia.org/oak-island-lighthouse)

Did you know?
Oak Island Lighthouse was first lit in 1958. Rather than having spiral staircases, as the older lighthouses have, Oak Island lighthouse is climbed using a series of ship ladders.

properties.Name: Cape Hatteras Lighthouse
properties.description:
Image courtesy of the State Archives of North Carolina (http://www.flickr.com/photos/north-carolina-state-archives/5387071235/)

Find out more about the Cape Hatteras Lighthouse here! (http://ncpedia.org/cape-hatteras-lighthouse)

Did you know?
The Hatteras Lighthouse was first lit in December 1870, but the famous black and white stripes were not painted until 1873.

properties.Name: Cape Lookout Lighthouse
properties.description:
Image courtesy of the State Archives of North Carolina (http://www.flickr.com/photos/north-carolina-state-archives/5387674580/)

Find out more about the Cape Lookout Lighthouse here! (http://ncpedia.org/cape-lookout-light-station)

Did you know?
The existing Cape Lookout Lighthouse was first lit in 1859, but the original lighthouse on Cape Lookout Seashore was built in 1812.

properties.Name: Ocracoke Lighthouse
properties.description:
Image courtesy of the State Archives of North Carolina (http://www.flickr.com/photos/north-carolina-state-archives/5387071195/)

Ocracoke Lighthouse was first lit in 1823, making it the oldest still-operating lighthouse on the Outer Banks. Find out more about North Carolina Lighthouses here! (http://ncpedia.org/lighthouses)

properties.Name: Bodie Island Lighthouse
properties.description:
Image courtesy of the State Archives of North Carolina (http://www.flickr.com/photos/north-carolina-state-archives/5387674490/)

The existing Bodie Island Lighthouse was first lit in 1872. Find out more about North Carolina lighthouses here (http://ncpedia.org/lighthouses)!
